content: Hi I am a new contributor to rust-analyzer. I am working with ide_completions. I was interested in knowing how you guys test some quick change or debug something in completions sources. I don't use VScode though. I am looking for some native lldb type setup.

#t-compiler/rust-analyzer is a better place for this question :smile:

I think usually most people just write tests and run them, maybe with some dbg!s to print values. Then once the tests are working, a final cargo install and check in the editor is often enough, unless the feature is very UI-heavy.
I will put it up over there. Thanks a lot for your suggestions!
